name: EUROPOLARIS European Policy Advice and Research & Innovation Strategies
goal: EUROPOLARIS provides independent strategic advice on European research and innovation policies
interests: Competition, Education, Enterprise, Information Society, Regional Policy, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
- Horizon 2020 Framework Programme for Research and Innovation, its mid-term evaluation and its successor programme as of 2021 (working title: Ninth Framework Programme for Research and Innovation, FP9)
- other European policies relevant for research and innovation, including general framework conditions
